Description: East Greek pottery plate on tall stem, repaired from several fragments; largely reserved with orange-fired bands and lines on both inside and out. Graffito dedication.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 1a)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 641, no. 2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.477)
